dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev just told his Transport Minister to seriously ramp up both domestic and international flights.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Tokayev just told his Transport Minister to seriously ramp up both domestic and international flights.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During a meeting with Minister of Transport Marat Karabayev, President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev instructed to increase the number of domestic and international flights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Marat Karabayev, right? He was the one briefing him at the Akorda residence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Marat Karabayev, right? He was the one briefing him at the Akorda residence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During a meeting with Minister of Transport Marat Karabayev, President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev instructed to increase the number of domestic and international flights. At the meeting at the Akorda residence, President Tokayev was briefed on the Ministry of Transport's performance results for 2024 and plans for the upcoming period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And get this—Kazakh airlines carried 14.7 million passengers this year. That's a ten percent jump.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And get this-Kazakh airlines carried fourteen point seven million passengers this year. That's a ten percent jump.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Karabayev reported that Kazakh airlines carried 14.7 million passengers, marking a 10 percent increase, while airports served 29.7 million passengers, up by 14 percent.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, that's a huge number. And they built three new terminals, in Almaty, Kyzylorda, and Shymkent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, that's a huge number. And they built three new terminals, in Almaty, Kyzylorda, and Shymkent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The construction of three new passenger terminals was completed at the airports of Almaty, Kyzylorda, and Shymkent.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they're not stopping there. They plan to launch 19 new air routes next year to Europe, Asia, and the Middle East.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they're not stopping there. They plan to launch nineteen new air routes next year to Europe, Asia, and the Middle East.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2025, the Ministry of Transport plans to launch 19 new air routes to Europe, Asia, and the Middle East.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's ambitious. Plus they're starting construction on airports in Katon-Karagai and a couple other places.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's ambitious. Plus they're starting construction on airports in Katon-Karagai and a couple other places.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Construction of airports in Katon-Karagai, Zaysan, and Kendirli will begin, along with the modernization of 125 railway stations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And modernizing 125 railway stations? That's a massive infrastructure push.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And modernizing one hundred twenty five railway stations? That's a massive infrastructure push.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Construction of airports in Katon-Karagai, Zaysan, and Kendirli will begin, along with the modernization of 125 railway stations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. The president emphasized making travel more comfortable and accessible for people in Kazakhstan too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. The president emphasized making travel more comfortable and accessible for people in Kazakhstan too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the conclusion of the meeting, the President highlighted the need to create more comfortable travel conditions for Kazakhstanis and improve accessibility to tourist destinations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he wants better conditions and more investment in the transport sector overall.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he wants better conditions and more investment in the transport sector overall.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "The Head of State instructed to increase the number of domestic and international flights, and also to strengthen efforts to attract investments into the transport sector," the Akorda press service reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, with transit volume up six percent already, it seems like they're on the right track, no pun intended.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, with transit volume up six percent already, it seems like they're on the right track, no pun intended.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Marat Karabayev, the overall volume of transit across all transport sectors increased by 6 percent in 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hah, true. And hey, didn't a South Korean airline just start a new route from Almaty to Seoul too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hah, true. And hey, didn't a South Korean airline just start a new route from Almaty to Seoul too?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, it was reported that a South Korean low-cost airline launched a new flight route between Almaty and Seoul.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, that's another piece of it—more international connections coming in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, that's another piece of it-more international connections coming in.
